DOC.brief_summary: Female handball athletes are at a particular risk of sustaining lower extremity injuries. The study examines time-dependent adaptations of static and dynamic balance as potential injury risk factors to a specific warm-up program focusing on neuromuscular control.
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Warm-up Intervention to Improve Postural Control in Female Handball Players
DOC.criteria: Gender: Female Handball players Actively participated in competitions Uninjured at study enrollment
